relationships.description: Harry is trying to persuade Slughorn to hand over a memory, as mentioned in the text: 'The Unknowable Room / Harry racked his brains over the next week as to how he was to persuade Slughorn to hand over the true memory'.
Harry and Hermione are arguing about finding something useful in the Potions book, as mentioned in the text: 'You won’t find anything in there,’ said Hermione firmly'.
Harry saved Ron's life due to the Prince's actions, as mentioned in the text: 'If it hadn’t been for the Prince, Ron wouldn’t be sitting here now'.
Harry listened to Snape in their first year at Hogwarts, as mentioned in the text: 'He would if you’d just listened to Snape in our first year'.

Harry is poring over the Potions book, hoping to find something useful, as mentioned in the text: 'He had just found an incantation (Sectum-sempra!) scrawled in a margin above the intriguing words ‘For Enemies’, and was itching to try it out'.
